title: Read a Dua Book by Sheikh Munajid in Tahajjud? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: Adikunul from Nigeria Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu Sheikh Wa'alaykumussalam Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu Sheikh, there is this book called Mi'at Du'a Min Kitabu Wa Sunnah Suhiha by Sheikh Muhammad so it's a summary of different prayers from the Quran and from various Hadith and Sunnah so I find it good because that book actually contains a lot you know goodness to you know praying for parents seeking for the good of this life and the hereafter so what's your question Adikunul so my question is I find it very good to you know read this book the full 100 du'as after this is not a question you're telling me you find it good so what is your question so my question is is it is it a bid'ah to to use an innovation to read this the whole book when I wake up for tahajjud no there is no problem in asking Allah Azawajal for whatever authentic du'a from the Quran and from the Sunnah and Sheikh Al-Munajid is a trusted Sheikh and the book is a good book inshallah to select du'as from
